subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When a Mets manager starts saying his team “battled” after a devastating loss, as Jerry Manuel did after the Mets were beat 7-5 by Philadelphia, it is not long before he is also saying goodbye.
snippet: When a Mets manager starts saying his team “battled” after a devastating loss, as Jerry Manuel did after the Mets were beat 7-5 by Philadelphia, it is not long before he is also saying goodbye.
